{{Infobox battle item |name = Griseous Orb |image = [[File:Griseous Orb.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Griseous Orb''. |location =
*[[Distortion World]] }} == Description == The '''Griseous Orb''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to Giratina. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 50%. == Acquisition == {{ItemPrice/head‎|Evolution items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Distortion World]]|[[Rare_Hold_Items|Rare Hold Item]] drop from Giratina (Altered) ''(Base 1/15 chance to drop)*''}} |} |} *Note: Using the [[Dowsing Machine]] increases the chances of obtaining Griseous Orb to 1/10.

==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Giratina (Altered).png|40px]] Giratina (Altered) || [[File:Giratina (Origin).png|40px]] Giratina (Origin) |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
